response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe holds immense value for you. Given its significance and the benefits it offers, I propose a special introductory offer. For a limited time, you can acquire this exceptional product for $1,350,000. This price reflects a strategic midpoint between the perceived value of $1,500,000 by you and my goal to maximize the return on this valuable asset. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can bring this opportunity to fruition soon.", "product_price": 1350000}
